page.title: 02SHAW - PAST AND PRESENT
page.content:
In Shaw there were lots of fields and not many houses.Now there are more houses and fewer fields.More people live in Shaw.More people used to work in Shaw because there were many mills but now most of them have been demolished so more people work out of Shaw.
Shaw had a town hall but it was demolished in 1981.Shaw clock was burned down and a snooker club was built in its place.Shaw used to have a lot of fog due to all the industry.There used to be a police station open all hours but that has been knocked down and the new one is open just during the day.The bus service used to stop in Shaw centre but now it goes all round Shaw.
